I think I enjoy Outlook.com's new beta web interface better -- however the beta has a problem -- if you accidentally drop a folder into another folder it is impossible to gracefully un-nest the new subfolder. According to Microsoft: You can't change the order of folders under Folders, and you can't move sub-folders into the main Folders menu. Sub-folders must always be inside another folder. https://support.office.com/en-us/article/working-with-message-folders-in-outlook-com-6bb0723a-f39f-4a8d-bb3f-fab5dcc2510a
